explanations.NietGedetecteerd: No cognitive process has been detected. This does not mean you have done nothing. The action you performed could not be detected as a cognitive or metacognitive process.
explanations.Orientatie: Orientation is figuring out what the task is. This can be done using the general instruction, rubric, and menu.
explanations.Plannen: Planning is making a schedule of the task. This can be done using the planner.
explanations.Monitoren: Monitoring is checking your learning. This can be done using the general instruction, notes, the planner, and the timer.
explanations.Evaluatie: Evaluation is checking the information in the text or essay. You can do this by comparing the information to the general instruction or rubric. Then you choose to continue with the same information or read or write something else.
explanations.Lezen: Reading is reading a text for the first time.
explanations.Herlezen: Rereading is reading a text again.
explanations.Schrijven: Writing is the act of writing the essay.
explanations.Verwerking/Organisatie: Note-taking is the taking or reading of notes.

categories.reflectionText1: What do you notice when you look at your timeline?
categories.reflectionText2: Which processes occur more or less and when do they occur?
categories.reflectionText3: Did this approach help you or not when writing your essay? Why or why not and when do they occur?
categories.reflectionText4: Wat zou je een volgende keer anders doen en waarom denk je dat dit je zou helpen?

login.title: Dashboard learning process
login.subtitle: Welcome to your personal dashboard!
login.subtitleText1: This dashboard provides insight into your learning process while writing the essay. To view your learning process, log in with your username.
login.subtitleText3: 1. you know more about the role of cognition and metacognition in learning,
login.subtitleText4: 2. you know more about your own learning process and the learning strategies you have used and
login.subtitleText5: 3. can you reflect on why you chose a particular learning strategy.
